description: This file contains the styles for the Recipe component of a Todo application, utilizing CSS variables for consistent theming and styling across various UI elements.

classes.name: .container
classes.description: Styles the main container for the recipe component, centering its content and applying background and text colors.

classes.name: .statusBar
classes.description: Styles the status bar of the recipe component, providing space between elements and aligning them vertically.

classes.name: .recipeCard
classes.description: Defines the styling for each individual recipe card, including margin and border radius.

classes.name: .rating
classes.description: Styles the rating overlay for recipe items, positioning it within the card with a specific background and padding.

classes.name: .bookmarkBtn
classes.description: Styles the bookmark button with specific colors and padding.
